ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark Expansion
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not concerned.  The question is - where is this information coming from? Verant hasn t released anything officially.  AFIK the info is coming from what
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not concerned. The question is - where is this information coming from?
Verant hasn't released anything officially. AFIK the info is coming from
what people are finding on the test server (both on the server and files
that are downloaded).

The conclusion I draw from this is not - that we aren't getting any - but
that ours will be tested less. Do you expect anything different?

Slyde

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2000 12:52 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Kunark Expansion


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
> I have been eagerly looking over the lists of test server spells on
Caster's
> Realm and have noticed one disturbing fact. There are no new bard spells
> listed, not even for our currently missing levels. Every other class has
at
> least 15 spells. With the expansion now less than a month away shouldn't
> there be some new bard spells if they have any intention of getting them
in
> for the expansion release?
>
> Kit
>
